content.text: Ted Kassar is a minor character who appears in the deleted scenes for the episode The Convention. He appears to be a friend of Josh Porter, as they strike up a conversation about Golf. He is introduced to Jim Halpert and Michael Scott but his conversation is ruined after Michael makes it awkward.
Ted mentions that he has a baby with his partner, Elizabeth.

images.caption: Ted Kassar, after Michael makes the conversation awkward.
